docs.lead_paragraph: Faced with the loss of patent protection for its antidepressant Effexor XR, Wyeth received federal approval for a follow-on drug, Pristiq, that the company hopes will also become a blockbuster.
docs.snippet: Faced with the loss of patent protection for its antidepressant Effexor XR, Wyeth received federal approval for a follow-on drug, Pristiq, that the company hopes will also become a blockbuster.
